title: Instant Marriage, Just Add Groom
description: No one was more surprised than Caleb when the town's proper bookstore owner made him an offer no red-blooded male could resist. But fathering a child with innocent Victoria Holbrook and walking away was not an option. Caleb refused to fill the position . . . unless Victoria said "I do." Available only in Romance 12.
author: Myrna Mackenzie
